sen.j: 宣子女王（よしこじょおう、生没年不詳）は、平安時代前期の皇族。
sen.e: Princess Yoshiko (Yoshiko Joo, years of birth and death unknown), was a member of Imperial family in early period of Heian period.
Princess Yoshiko (years of birth and death unknown), was a member of the Imperial family who lived in the early Heian period.
Princess Yoshiko (years of birth and death unknown), was a member of the Imperial Family who lived in the early Heian period.
She was Ise Saigu (vestal virgin princess serving at Ise-jingu Shrine).
She was an Ise Saigu (a vestal virgin princess serving at Ise-jingu Shrine).
She was an Ise Saigu (a vestal virgin princess serving at Ise-jingu Shrine).

sen.j: 桓武天皇の皇孫で、父は式部卿宮仲野親王。
sen.e: She was an Imperial descendant of Emperor Kanmu, and her father was Shikibukyo no Miya (the Highness of Ceremonial), Imperial Prince Nakano.
She was a descendant of Emperor Kanmu, and her father was Shikibukyo no Miya (the Highness of Ceremonial), Imperial Prince Nakano.
sen.cmt: I'm not sure what to do with “Highness of Ceremonial”, but I am sure it is not a good translation.
sen.e: She was a descendant of Emperor Kanmu, and her father was Shikibukyo no Miya (the Highness of Ceremonial), Imperial Prince Nakano.
Her mother was one of the Sugano clan.
Her mother was from the Sugano clan.
Her mother was from the Sugano clan.

sen.j: 天長5年（828年）2月、叔父・淳和天皇の斎宮に卜定され、天長7年（830年）9月伊勢へ群行した。
sen.e: In February 828, she was selected by bokujo (to decide by fortunetelling) as Saigu by her uncle, Emperor Junna, and made Gunko (Saigu heading to Ise after the purification) to Ise in September of 830.
In February 828, she was selected by her uncle, Emperor Junna, through divination to be a Saigu, and traveled to Ise after in September of 830.
In February 828, she was selected by her uncle, Emperor Junna, through divination to be a Saigu, and traveled to Ise after in September of 830.

sen.j: 天長10年（833年）2月、淳和天皇譲位により退下。
sen.e: In February 833, she resigned by abdication of the throne of Emperor Junna.
In February 833, she resigned because of Emperor Junna's abdication of the throne.
In February 833, she resigned because of Emperor Junna's abdication of the throne.
